SimpleDataListSpec.Name: Change Agent ID By Name - Simple Data List
SimpleDataListSpec.Description: Change Agents by Name return ID
SimpleDataListSpec.Author: Bill Elfstrom

SPSimpleList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_CHANGEAGENTIDBYNAME as
select CHANGEAGENT.ID AS VALUE, CHANGEAGENT.USERNAME as LABEL from dbo.CHANGEAGENT order by CHANGEAGENT.USERNAME
